attributes.action: the right to wear a poppy proud
attributes.additional_details: It's an out rage that people are being told that they can not wear a poppy in remembrance of soldiers of our country that fought to save everything we are so proud of people should be able to wear a poppy proudly and not told to remove them through fear of offending somebody this is our country and people should be proud of our soldiers those alive and those past fighting we want to remember
